data.description_html:
The subject's eyes burst, spraying acid upon everyone within 5 feet.
The subject is blinded and takes 1d6 points of acid damage.
Those sprayed take 1d6 points of acid damage (Reflex save for half ).
Creatures without eyes can't be blinded, but they might take acid damage if someone nearby is the subject of seething eyebane.
Corruption Cost: 1d6 points of Constitution damage.
data.name: Seething Eyebane
